title: 17-Year-Old Man Charged With Negligent Homicide After Accidentally Shooting Friend
content:
Baton Rouge Police have charged 17-year-old Ahmad Antoine of Baton Rouge with Negligent Homicide in the city’s latest shooting death.
Investigators say Antoine and his friend, 17-year-old Devin Anderson, were playing with a shotgun on the front porch of Antoine’s residence last night around 5:00pm. Antoine said the gun accidentally went off, striking Anderson, who died at the scene.
Antoine was booked into the EBR Parish Prison.
